name: tinder_pass_profile
description: Pass/Nope the currently shown profile on Tinder. Requires login.

steps.code: const nopeBtn = document.querySelector('[aria-label="Nope"], button[class*="recsGamepad__button--nope"], button[class*="nope"], button[class*="Bgi($g-ds-background-nope)"]'); if (nopeBtn) { nopeBtn.click(); return { success: true, action: 'passed' }; } return { success: false, message: 'Nope button not found' };
steps.name: result
steps.label: Click pass
